title: Why I didn't get the new ezreal icon? (I have the Pulsefire Ezreal skin)
body: Why I didn't get the new ezreal icon? (I have the Pulsefire Ezreal skin){{champion:81}}

replies.body: Myself and many other people I know who have Pulsefire Ezreal haven't gotten their icon either... And it's not the first time I've missed out on an icon I should have received... Does riot know how much it's distribution system for these things screws up?

Hey there,

As of today, distribution for these icons has completed.

If you still are yet to receive your icon, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance.
i got the icon yesterday you just need to click the bell by your name
I don't have it yet either and I have owned it since it first came out.
